wishes.text:
May the spirit of Holi bring you joyyy,The gladness of Holi give you Hope, The warmth of Holi grant you cheer.
Wish You A Very Happy Holi

Let the colors of Holi spread happiness, gaeity, peace and love all around.
Wish you a blessed Holi!

May the splash of colors bring joy within your family.
Have a Happy Holi!

Happiness is the most beautiful color in life which I wish should stay forever with you.
Happy Holi!

May God gift you all the colours of life, colours of joy, colours of happiness, colours of friendship, colours of love and all other colours you want to paint your life in. 
Happy Holi.

May this Holi add more colors to your life.
Happy Holi.

Wishing you a Holi full of fun and frolic.Eat gujiyas, dance like crazy.Enjoy.
Happy Holi!

Enjoy every colour of Holi and u will get every happiness u desire.Hey, God is always with u.Enjoy every moment.
Happy Holi!!

Wishing you and your family a very bright, colourful and joyful Holi.
With love and best wishes

Happy Holi to you and your family. We wish your health, prosperity and business achievements at this prismic colour eve. May Allah bless you with all his mercies! Aamin. 
Happy Holi!!!
'Bright colors, water balloons, lavish gujiyas and melodious songs' are the ingredients of perfect Holi. Wish you a very happy and wonderful Holi.
